subject: Add Lisa Commands section to all template READMEs
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Add a `## Lisa Commands` section between "Step 4: Work on a Feature" and "## Common Tasks" in each template README. The section contains a single "Ask Claude" blockquote directing users to ask about Lisa commands via `HUMAN.md`.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `all/copy-overwrite/README.md` has Lisa Commands section
- [ ] `expo/copy-overwrite/README.md` has Lisa Commands section
- [ ] `nestjs/copy-overwrite/README.md` has Lisa Commands section
- [ ] `cdk/copy-overwrite/README.md` has Lisa Commands section
- [ ] `npm-package/copy-overwrite/README.md` has Lisa Commands section
- [ ] Section is placed between Step 4 and Common Tasks

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Implementation Details:** Insert after the utility commands list under Step 4 and before `## Common Tasks`.

**Testing Requirements:** N/A

**Verification:** `grep -c 'Lisa Commands' all/copy-overwrite/README.md expo/copy-overwrite/README.md nestjs/copy-overwrite/README.md cdk/copy-overwrite/README.md npm-package/copy-overwrite/README.md` - each file shows count of 1
